verses.name: Joshua 15:48
verses.text: And in the mountains, Shamir, and Jattir, and Socoh,

verses.name: Joshua 15:49
verses.text: And Dannah, and Kirjath–sannah, which is Debir,

verses.name: Joshua 15:50
verses.text: And Anab, and Eshtemoh, and Anim,

verses.name: Joshua 15:51
verses.text: And Goshen, and Holon, and Giloh; eleven cities with their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 15:53
verses.text: And Janum, and Beth–tappuah, and Aphekah,

verses.name: Joshua 15:54
verses.text: And Humtah, and Kirjath–arba, which is Hebron, and Zior; nine cities with their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 15:55
verses.text: Maon, Carmel, and Ziph, and Juttah,

verses.name: Joshua 15:56
verses.text: And Jezreel, and Jokdeam, and Zanoah,

verses.name: Joshua 15:57
verses.text: Cain, Gibeah, and Timnah; ten cities with their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 15:59
verses.text: And Maarath, and Beth–anoth, and Eltekon; six cities with their villages:
